channel.title: Error please help
channel.description:
[code]MakeCharFile.java:6: MakeCharFile is not abstract and does not override abstract method actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) in java.awt.event.ActionList ener public class MakeCharFile extends JFrame implements ActionListener ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
thats the error.
[code]import java.io.*; import java.awt.*; import java.awt.event.*; import javax.swing.*;
public class MYFILENAME extends JFrame implements ActionListener {[/code]
Top of my class file.

item.title: Error please help
item.dc:creator: @javaNoob javaNoob()
item.description:
@javaNoob wrote:

stupid me i forgot to put the ActionEvent e in my action performed method.

Read full topic

item.title: Error please help
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

MakeCharFile.java:6: MakeCharFile is not abstract and does not override abstract method actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) in java.awt.event.ActionList ener

You need to have the “actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)” method

Read full topic
